predicate: A UE is not expected to be configured with field2 if field1 is set to 'type[I-r16', 'type[I-PortSelection-r16' or 'type[I-PortSelection-r17'
notes: The rule is derived from the evidence that a UE is not expected to be configured with field2 if field1 is set to 'type[I-r16', 'type[I-PortSelection-r16' or 'type[I-PortSelection-r17'.

meta.evidence: - wideband PMI or subband PMI reporting as configured by the higher layer parameter pmi-FormatIndicator. When wideband PMI reporting is configured, a wideband PMI is reported for the entire CSI reporting band. When subband PMI reporting is configured, except with 2 antenna ports, a single wideband indication (i) in Clause 5.2.2.2) is reported for the entire CSI reporting band and one subband indication ( i_{2} in clause 5.2.2.2) is reported for each subband in the CSI reporting band. When subband PMIs are configured with 2 antenna ports, a PMI is reported for each subband in the CSI reporting band. - a UE is not expected to be configured with pmi-FormatIndicator if codebookType is set to 'type[I-r16' or 'type[I-PortSelection-r16' or 'type[I-PortSelection-r17'.
